bibl.title: Letter from Sarah D. Penhallow to Laura Armistead Carter, September 15, 1925

div1.p: Penhallow expresses her sympathy for Henry Carter's death.

div1.head: Letter from Sarah D. Penhallow to Laura Armistead Carter, September 15, 1925
div1.p:
Please accept
for yourself, your brother's
and Aunt my most
sincere and heartfelt
sympathy in this great
sorrow and for that
has come not only to you
all, but to this many
friends, It was always
a pleasure to meet your
father's, so cheerful and
delightful men when
suffering so much.

Again expressing my sincere
sympathy, Believe me
with love
